title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women's Shawls Wrap Poncho Soft Capes Open Front Cardigan Large Blanket Wraps Shawl Knitted Cloak Cardigan Warm

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #343,735 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #2,095 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shawl soft, beautiful, and warm, with one mentioning it's non-itchy. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's way oversized. The hang quality also gets mixed reviews, with one customer mentioning the strap keeps it in place.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fit as expected
items.body: I was able to conceal my 30 weeks pregnancy with this, given that I sized up a couple sizes but it was a great buy. It was also warm and soft. Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just as comfortable as it is beautiful.
items.body: The color is a rich color of gray that is very appealing to the eye. Extremely soft next to the neck and was so refreshing, not once did I have to readjust the shawl because the strap kept it in place. Wouldn't change a thing; however, a hidden pocket for keys, cell & change purse would be a nice addition. Read more
items.author: Cyn-see

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't hang like shown
items.body: Basically a thin wrap with a strap to keep it closed. Unfortunately it doesn't hang evenly once the one side is fed through the strap. Cute and lightweight tho. Maybe the strap is too high on the one I received. Returning Read more
items.author: PennyR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant sweater
items.body: One of my favorite sweaters this past winter. I would get constant compliments and questions on where I purchased. It was just so chic and simple with jeans and black boots. The sweater was warm and the material non itchy. It did leave a little lint sometimes on some of my clothes but wasn’t too big of a big deal. Would buy again in black! Read more
items.author: Gabriela

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cold weather topper
items.body: This item is very soft and cozy, but very thick and oversized. You would not be able to add another coat on top of this piece. Read more
items.author: Tyree McDowell

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very oversized and long
items.body: I am 5’8” and 175 pounds. This went nearly to my knees and is way oversized. Very soft but not for me. Read more
items.author: swilliams

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: New-khaki, New-yellow, New-beige, New-pink, New-black, New-darkgrey, New-green, New-winered, New-coffee, New-lightgrey, New-navy, New-blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
